## Regression analysis
To examine what determines the ethnic diversity of ones egonet, we conducted four linear regression models. The first model contained the ethnicity of the ego, the second model the year of first publication and the third model gender. Last, all three effects were calculated in one final model.

&nbsp;
&nbsp;

![](images/tabel5.png)

&nbsp;

For Sociology staff members of Radboud University, we observe that younger scholars have a significantly more ethnically diverse collaboration network than older scholars (b = 0.88).
&nbsp;
Within Utrecht University, sociologists with a Dutch lastname have, on average, a less ethnically diverse collaboration network (b = -24.01).
